title: 81/877/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 October 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'CME square wave electromagnetic flowmeter, model 501, with blood flow probes, model EP 1101, 5S, model EP 1102 S and model EP 1102 R' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 8 October 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as "CME square wave electromagnetic flowmeter, model 501, with blood flow probes, model EP 1101, 5S, model EP 1102 S and model EP 1102 R" may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties (81/877/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "CME square wave electromagnetic flowmeter, model 501, with blood flow probes, model EP 1101, 5S, model EP 1102 S and model EP 1102 R" which is the subject of an application by the United Kingdom of 7 April 1981 may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 October 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 134, 31.5.1979, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
